languages.text: {n}Малгар тяжело кивает.{/n} "Добро. Вы нас {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}не бросили{/d} в трудный час, и мы вас не бросим. Садитесь в любой шаттл, вывезем вас на орбиту".

{n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}didn't abandon{/d} us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."
languages.original_text: {n}Малгар тяжело кивает.{/n} "Добро. Вы нас {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}не бросили{/d} в трудный час, и мы вас не бросим. Садитесь в любой шаттл, вывезем вас на орбиту".

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You didn't abandon us when the going got tough, and we won't abandon you either. Get aboard any of these shuttles, {mf|sir|ma'am}, we'll take you to orbit."
{n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You didn't abandon us when the going got tough, and we won't abandon you either. Get aboard any of these shuttles, {mf|sir|ma'am}, we'll take you to orbit."
{n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You didn't abandon us in the hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."
{n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You didn't abandon us in the hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."
{n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You didn't abandon us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."
{n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You didn't abandon us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."

{n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}didn't abandon{/d} us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."

languages.text: {n}Malgar nickt schwer.{/n} "Also schön. Ihr habt uns in der Stunde der Not {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}nicht aufgegeben{/d}, also tun auch wir das nicht. Steigt an Bord eines Shuttles, dann bringen wir Euch in den Orbit."
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}didn't abandon{/d} us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar nickt schwer.{/n} "Also schön. Ihr habt uns in der Stunde der Not nicht aufgegeben, also tun auch wir das nicht. Steigt an Bord eines Shuttles, dann bringen wir Euch in den Orbit."

languages.text: {n}Malgar acquiesce.{/n} « Très bien. Vous nous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}pas abandonnés{/d} quand on avait besoin de vous, alors on va vous renvoyer l'ascenseur. Montez à bord d'une de ces navettes et on vous emmènera en orbite. »
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}didn't abandon{/d} us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar acquiesce.{/n} « Très bien. Vous nous avez pas abandonnés quand on avait besoin de vous, alors on va vous renvoyer l'ascenseur. Montez à bord d'une de ces navettes et on vous emmènera en orbite. »

languages.text: {n}马尔加沉重地点点头。{/n}“没问题，我们身处险境的时候，您{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}没有抛弃我们{/d}，那我们也不会抛弃您。随便上哪艘穿梭机都行，我们会把您送上轨道。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}didn't abandon{/d} us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."

traits.locale_text: {n}马尔加沉重地点点头。{/n}“没问题，我们身处险境的时候，您没有抛弃我们，那我们也不会抛弃您。随便上哪艘穿梭机都行，我们会把您送上轨道。”

languages.text: {n}マルガーは大きくうなずく。{/n}「わかりました。あなたは苦難の時に我々を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}見捨てなかった{/d}。このシャトルのどれかに乗れば、軌道までお連れしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}didn't abandon{/d} us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."

traits.locale_text: {n}マルガーは大きくうなずく。{/n}「いいだろう。あなたは苦難の時に我々を見捨てなかった。このシャトルのどれかに乗れば、軌道までお連れしよう」

languages.text: {n}Malgar asiente profundamente.{/n} «De acuerdo. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}No nos ha abandonado{/d} en nuestro momento de necesidad, y nosotros tampoco lo haremos. Suban a bordo de cualquiera de estas lanzaderas, les llevaremos a la órbita».
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}didn't abandon{/d} us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar asiente profundamente.{/n}«De acuerdo. No nos abandonaron en el momento de necesidad, y nosotros tampoco lo haremos. Suban a bordo de cualquiera de estas lanzaderas, les llevaremos a la órbita».

languages.text: {n}Malgar, başını ağır ağır yukarı aşağı sallıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Siz bizi müşkül durumdayken {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}terk etmediniz{/d}, biz de etmeyeceğiz. İstediğiniz mekiğe binebilirsiniz, sizi yörüngeye çıkaracağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Malgar nods heavily.{/n} "All right. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}didn't abandon{/d} us in our hour of need, and neither will we. Get aboard any of these shuttles, we'll take you to orbit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar başını ağır ağır sallıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Siz bizi müşkül durumda bırakmadınız, biz de sizi bırakmayacağız. İstediğiniz mekiğe binebilirsiniz, sizi yörüngeye çıkaracağız."
